response.overview: BUDH, is a women centric Short Film (Based on Indian Roots) . Itâ€™s a Story of three women from different parts of India in different age group. Its about 19 Year old Catholic girl Yvonne from a metropolitan city, 32 year old Zainab a Muslim house wife from Small city and Laxmi a Hindu Widow from a Northern village of India. These women have a similar struggle in their daily life and that is mental and physical abuse. Their intensity and situation varies but the consistency is the same.
response.title: Budh
